Definition: Given a sentence in Hindi(hi), give the translation of the sentence in English(en) as output

Positive Examples.input: आप सबको दीपावली की बहुत बहुत शुभकामनाए
Positive Examples.output: On the pious festival of Deepawali, greetings to all of you.
Positive Examples.explanation: The translation was accurate, so we can say that the translation was successful

Positive Examples.input: उन्हें गर्व है कि उनकी बेटी बेहतरीन painting करती है
Positive Examples.output: She is proud of her daughters excellent painting ability.
Positive Examples.explanation: The translation was fluent and formal, so we can say that the translation was successful

Positive Examples.input: उन्होंने, सेवा को हमेशा सर्वोपरि रखा
Positive Examples.output: He accorded the highest significance to the spirit of service.
Positive Examples.explanation: The translation perfectly conveyed the meaning of the sentence, so we can say that the translation was successful

Negative Examples.input: कई स्थानों पर गये और जहां भी गये, वहां, अपनी सरलता, विनम्रता, सादगी  उन्होंने सबका दिल जीत लिया
Negative Examples.output: He stood firm against social ills such as untouchability.
Negative Examples.explanation: The translated sentence and the given input sentence have different meanings, so we can say that the translation is unsuccessful

Negative Examples.input: गुरुनानक देव जी ने अपना सन्देश, दुनिया मे पहुचाया
Negative Examples.output: Sri Guru Nanak Dev ji radiated his message to all corners of the world.
Negative Examples.explanation: The translation is partially done and doesn't give the whole meaning of the input sentence, so we can say that the translation is unsuccessful

Negative Examples.input: उन्होंने हरिद्वार की पवित्र भूमि की यात्रा की
Negative Examples.output: He was the widest travelled of those times.
Negative Examples.explanation: The translated sentence and the input sentence speak about a person, but in different contexts which leads to both having different meanings, so we can say that the translation is unsuccessful

Instances.input: पैन्निदा पर्मेगोंडनू हिमावंतनु,पैन्निदा भृगु पर्चिदानुपैन्निदा जनकरायनु जसुवलीदनू(Penninda permegondanu himavantanu.Penninda broohu perchidanuPenninda janakaraayanu jasuvalendanu)अर्थात हिमवन्त यानी पर्वतराजा ने अपनी बेटी पार्वती के कारण, षि भृगु ने अपनी बेटी लक्ष्मी के कारण और राजा जनक ने अपनी बेटी सीता के कारण प्रसिद्धि पायी
